creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
Missing Description:
Access the jsp/security/protected/index.jsp
example then access it again as a different user.
getRemoteUser and getUserPrincipal won't match
for the 2nd request.

===== Workaround =====
To fix the bug: in the initRequest() method of 
tomcat/core/RequestImpl.java
add the line
principal = null;
in with everything else that gets reset.

Submitter: Brian Moore, tomcat@dsl-64-34-176-53.telocity.com

This patch has been applied in Tomcat 3.2.2 and Tomcat 3.3
Fixed in Tomcat 3.2.2
Fixed in Tomcat 3.3
